name: Raygain Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
overview:
Raygain Technologies is a core IT Services and Solutions Company, with an extended arm involved in management consulting and market research. We have extensive experience and comprehensive capabilities to deliver solutions across all industry verticals and business functions. Raygain has been conferred quality certification (ISO 9001:2008) in year 2011.

Raygain provides the following products and services in IT: Website Development Portal Development Content Management System Custom ERP (EazyBiz) E-learning Management Solutions Enterprise Mobility Solution (MobiSuite) Mobility in various platforms like iOS, Android, Windows, J2ME, BlackBerry etc.

Raygain Technologies has an in-house market research (MR) capabilities supporting both international and domestic clients across the entire market research value-chain. We conduct qualitative and quantitative research and have the expertise and experience in executing projects in various industries and regions offering customized solutions to our clients helping them derive maximum value from research.

Some areas of research covered by our team are as follows: IT Research ITES Technology Hardware & Equipment Telecommunications Semiconductors Automobiles and Components BFSI FMCG Capital Goods Commercial Services & Supplies Consumer Durables and Apparels Food & Staples Retailing Food, Beverage & Tobacco Health Care Equipment & Services Household & Personal Products Media Real Estate Retailing Transportation Utilities- Energy

Specialties IT Services, Customised Software, Mobility Software, Research Survey Software, Logistics Software, Educational Software - CampusWare, ERP, Business Research, Market Research, Data Analytics, Business Process Outsourcing, Management Consulting, Advisory Services
